description: This is a fork of the Bembel library created by Jürgen Dölz, Helmut Harbecht, Stefan Kurz, Michael Multerer, Maximilian Nolte, Sebastian Schöps and Felix Wolf. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3759415, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.softx.2020.100476
references: J. Dölz, H. Harbrecht, S. Kurz, M. Multerer, M. Nolte, S. Schöps and F. Wolf. (2020). temf/bembel: v1.0 (v1.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3759415

J. Dölz et al. "Bembel: The fast isogeometric boundary element C++ library for Laplace, Helmholtz, and electric wave equation". In: SoftwareX 11 (2020), p. 100476. doi: 10.1016/j.softx.2020.100476. url: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.softx.2020.100476.
